hero.subtitle: An Online Freelance Platform Where Creativity Meets Opportunity

about.title: We Are More than A freelance platform
about.subtitle: Our team crafts solutions that don't just look good, they deliver real impact.

pick.title: Pick the best services
pick.subtitle: find freelancers based on their work, experience, and pricing. You can browse through detailed profiles showcasing portfolios, past projects, and client reviews.

collaboration.title: Collaboration with Real-Time Assignments
collaboration.subtitle: smart calendar that automatically fills in deadlines, meetings, and milestones as you set tasks. Easily visualize your project timeline, schedule meetings, and track key milestones in one place, ensuring you stay organized and on top of your projects.

seamlessClient.title: Seamless Client Communication
seamlessClient.subtitle: Effortlessly connect to share ideas and feedback in real time, ensuring your project stays on track and aligns with your vision every step of the way.

revisions.title: Seamless Project Revisions
revisions.subtitle: Our streamlined revision process ensures that every detail is perfected to align with your vision for outstanding results.

protecting.title: Protecting Your Digital Assets
protecting.subtitle: Your data's security is our priority. With advanced encryption and privacy features, our digital safe keeps your information safe and accessible when you need it.

tabs.Analytics: Our intuitive Dashboard serves as your all-in-one hub for managing freelance projects and finances. With real-time analytics and comprehensive insights, you can effortlessly track spending, monitor project progress, and oversee all your freelancers in one place. Schedule meetings directly through the platform and keep track of important deadlines with our integrated calendar. Simplify your financial processes with our built-in invoice generation tool, ensuring timely and accurate payments while helping freelancers meet their deadlines and milestones.
tabs.Loyalty Program: freelancers and users to earn rewards for their spending on the platform. As you invest more in projects or services, you accumulate credits that can be redeemed for discounts on future transactions. This program not only enhances your purchasing power but also encourages loyalty to our platform. Take advantage of this opportunity to save while accessing top-tier freelance talent and services!
tabs.AI Integrat ion: Our Dashboard utilizes advanced AI algorithms to match users with the most suitable freelancers and services. By analyzing your project requirements, preferences, and past interactions, the AI provides tailored recommendations, ensuring you find the right fit quickly and efficiently. This intelligent matching system streamlines your search process, saving you time and enhancing your overall experience on the platform.

tools.title: The all in one tool for your freelance service
tools.subtitle: We simplify your workflow

hero.title: We Are Talentz
hero.subtitle: Talentz is an innovative online freelance platform designed to transform the landscape of freelance work. Our focus is on creating a tailored experience that meets the unique demands of the dynamic freelance ecosystem. We are dedicated to fostering a vibrant community that encourages collaboration and growth.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.subtitle: Our mission is to empower freelancers and businesses by providing a secure, efficient, and user-friendly environment for online collaboration. We strive to enhance productivity and facilitate meaningful connections, ensuring that every user can thrive in their respective fields.

goals.title: Our Goals
goals.subtitle: We aim to lead the freelance market by delivering exceptional service and a superior user experience. Our commitment is to build a platform that adapts to the evolving needs of our users, creating a localized and supportive community that drives innovation and success.

info.title: We Are Growing
info.subtitle: We are growing alongside our innovations

join.label: Join Us?
join.info: Want to become a part of our dynamic team?

solution.title: Your One Stop Solution for your work
solution.subtitle: Your all-in-one hub for managing freelance projects and finances. With real-time analytics and comprehensive insights, you can effortlessly track spending, monitor project progress, and oversee all your freelancers in one place.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.subtitle: We are happy to help with your questions

items.question: What services can I find on Talentz?
items.answer: You can find a wide range of services, including graphic design, writing, web development, digital marketing, and more.

items.question: How do I hire a freelancer on Talentz?
items.answer: You can find a wide range of services, including graphic design, writing, web development, digital marketing, and more.

items.question: Is there any fee to use Talentz?
items.answer: You can find a wide range of services, including graphic design, writing, web development, digital marketing, and more.

items.question: How does Talentz ensure the quality of freelancers?
items.answer: We have a rigorous vetting process that includes reviewing portfolios, conducting interviews, and checking references to ensure that only qualified freelancers are allowed on our platform.

items.question: What payment methods are accepted on Talentz?
items.answer: We accept various payment methods, including credit/debit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers.

items.question: How does Talentz protect my data?
items.answer: We use advanced encryption and privacy features to ensure that your data is secure and accessible only to you.

contact.title: We'd Love to Hear From You
contact.subtitle: Share your thoughts, suggestions, or any questions you may have with us. Your input helps us improve and enhance our services to better meet your needs.

hirePage.title: Ready to Start Your Journey?
hirePage.subtitle: Whether you're looking to hire the best talent or showcase your skills to the world, we're here for you. Sign up today and take the first step towards achieving your goals!

sections.heading: 1. Introduction
sections.content: Welcome to Talentz. These Terms of Service govern your use of our platform operated by Talentz Limited. By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these terms. If you do not agree, please do not use the platform.

sections.heading: 2. Eligibility
sections.content: You must be at least 18 years old and capable of forming a legally binding contract to use Talentz. By registering, you represent and warrant that you meet these requirements.

sections.heading: 3. Account Registration
sections.content: To access certain features, you must create an account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your login credentials and for all activities that occur under your account. You agree to provide accurate and complete information during registration and to update it as necessary.

sections.heading: 4. Services & Fees
sections.content: Talentz provides an online freelance marketplace connecting clients with freelancers. We charge service fees on transactions processed through the platform. Fee details are available on your dashboard and may be updated from time to time with prior notice.

sections.heading: 5. User Conduct
sections.content: You agree not to use the platform for any unlawful purpose or in violation of these terms. Prohibited activities include but are not limited to: posting false or misleading information, harassing other users, attempting to bypass platform fees, uploading malicious software, or infringing on intellectual property rights.

sections.heading: 6. Intellectual Property
sections.content: All content on Talentz, including logos, text, graphics, and software, is the property of Talentz Limited or its licensors and is protected by applicable intellectual property laws. Freelancers retain ownership of their original work unless otherwise agreed in writing with the client.

sections.heading: 7. Payment Terms
sections.content: All payments are processed through our secure payment system. Clients agree to pay for services as agreed upon with the freelancer. Talentz holds funds in escrow until the work is completed and approved. Refund and dispute policies are outlined in our Help Center.

sections.heading: 8. Dispute Resolution
sections.content: In the event of a dispute between a client and freelancer, Talentz offers a mediation process to help resolve the matter. If mediation fails, disputes shall be resolved through binding arbitration in accordance with the laws of Hong Kong.

sections.heading: 9. Limitation of Liability
sections.content: To the fullest extent permitted by law, Talentz Limited shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising from your use of the platform. Our total liability shall not exceed the fees paid by you in the twelve months preceding the claim.

sections.heading: 10. Termination
sections.content: Talentz reserves the right to suspend or terminate your account at any time for violations of these terms or for any other reason at our sole discretion. Upon termination, your right to use the platform ceases immediately.

sections.heading: 11. Governing Law
sections.content: These terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Hong Kong SAR, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

sections.heading: 12. Contact Us
sections.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us:

sections.heading: 1. Introduction
sections.content: Talentz Limited is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our platform.

sections.heading: 2. Information We Collect
sections.content: We collect information you provide directly, such as your name, email address, phone number, payment information, and profile details. We also automatically collect usage data including IP address, browser type, device information, and browsing activity on our platform.

sections.heading: 3. How We Use Your Information
items: Provide, maintain, and improve our services
Process transactions and send related information
Detect, prevent, and address fraud and security issues

sections.heading: 4. Information Sharing
sections.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your data with service providers who assist in operating our platform, with other users as necessary for transactions, or when required by law. We may also share aggregated, non-identifiable data for analytics purposes.

sections.heading: 5. Data Security
sections.content: We implement industry-standard security measures including encryption, secure servers, and access controls to protect your information. However, no method of electronic transmission or storage is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

sections.heading: 6. Cookies
sections.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience. For more details, please refer to our Cookie Policy.

sections.heading: 7. Third-Party Links
sections.content: Our platform may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these external sites. We encourage you to review their privacy policies before providing any personal information.

sections.heading: 8. Data Retention
sections.content: We retain your personal information for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide our services. We may also retain data as necessary to comply with legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our agreements.

sections.heading: 9. Your Rights
sections.content: Depending on your location, you may have the right to access, correct, delete, or port your personal data. You may also have the right to withdraw consent or object to certain data processing. To exercise these rights, please contact us using the information below.

sections.heading: 10. Children's Privacy
sections.content: Talentz is not intended for users under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If we learn that we have collected data from a child, we will take steps to delete it promptly.

sections.heading: 11. Policy Changes
sections.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the updated policy on our platform and updating the "Last updated" date.

sections.heading: 12. Contact Us
sections.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:

sections.heading: 1. What Are Cookies
sections.content: Cookies are small text files placed on your device when you visit a website. They help the site remember your preferences and understand how you interact with the platform. Cookies may be "session" cookies (deleted when you close your browser) or "persistent" cookies (remaining until they expire or you delete them).

sections.heading: 2. How We Use Cookies
sections.content: We use the following types of cookies on Talentz:
items: Essential Cookies: Required for the platform to function properly. They enable core features such as authentication, security, and session management.
Performance Cookies: Help us understand how visitors interact with our platform by collecting anonymous usage data. This helps us improve performance and user experience.
Functional Cookies: Remember your preferences and settings (such as language and region) to provide a more personalized experience.
Targeting Cookies: Used to deliver relevant advertisements and measure the effectiveness of our marketing campaigns.

sections.heading: 3. Managing Cookies
sections.content: You can control and manage cookies through your browser settings. Most browsers allow you to block or delete cookies. However, disabling certain cookies may affect the functionality of our platform. Please refer to your browser's help section for instructions on managing cookies.

sections.heading: 4. Third-Party Cookies
sections.content: Some cookies on our platform are placed by third-party services we use, such as analytics providers and advertising partners. These third parties have their own privacy and cookie policies, and we encourage you to review them.

sections.heading: 5. Policy Changes
sections.content: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated "Last updated" date.

sections.heading: 6. Contact Us
sections.content: If you have any questions about our use of cookies, please contact us:
